body_html: Oh, right. Sorry, I was sloppy with that statement. I meant to say that the problem is probably in the (presumably shared) softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits part of the function and not in the additional indexing operations that sparse_softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits does on top of that, which @tillahoffmann suggested was the culprit.
body_text: Oh, right. Sorry, I was sloppy with that statement. I meant to say that the problem is probably in the (presumably shared) softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits part of the function and not in the additional indexing operations that sparse_softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits does on top of that, which @tillahoffmann suggested was the culprit.
body: Oh, right. Sorry, I was sloppy with that statement. I meant to say that the problem is probably in the (presumably shared) `softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits` part of the function and not in the additional indexing operations that `sparse_softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits` does on top of that, which @tillahoffmann suggested was the culprit.
